attributes.action: Force Mobile suppliers to give better broadband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of digging up the pavements putting in fiber optic cables, why not allow all Mobile companies to increase there power output of there masts so that the whole country can enjoy super fast broadband even on there home PCs for a fraction of the costs.
or even see what can be done to utilise the TV masts
